result:
Food Menu
The Music Hall Club is proud to serve our own freshly made recipes and free-range, chemical preservative/ hormone / antibiotic / nitrate free natural meats from Applegate Farms & freshly baked breads from Goldcrust Bakery.
* GF Gluten Free, V Vegetarian, V+ Vegan *
Taco Salad (V+, GF)
$7
shredded romaine, diced tomatoes, green peppers & onions smothered in vegan chili & salsa, topped with crushed tortilla chips *add monterey jack and sour cream $8*
Hummus (V+)
$7
Music Hall’s freshly made hummus served with pita points, tomato wedges, celery, carrots & green peppers.
Quesadilla (V)
$7
monterey jack, diced tomatoes & onions melted together in a whole wheat tortilla, served with sour cream & salsa *try it with vegan refried beans $8 or grilled chicken $9* (takes about 15 – 20 minutes to bake)
Mini Pita Pizza (V)
$7
diced red onions & tomatoes covered in garlic-basil balsamic vinaigrette, tomato sauce & provolone on a flat pita *add extra cheese $1*; *add green peppers pineapple, olive tapenade, black olives, spinach, pesto, roasted red peppers $1; fresh mozzarella, pepperoni, sausage, ham $2* (takes about 15 – 20 minutes to bake)
Music Hall Chili & Brown Rice (V+, GF)
$6
brown rice topped with Music Hall’s homemade chunky vegan chili, diced tomatoes & red onions, salsa & tortilla chips *try it with monterey jack & sour cream $8*
Nachos of Ulysses (V, GF)
$8
tortilla chips smothered in monterey jack, diced tomatoes & onions, salsa & sour cream *with beans $9*
Macho Nachos (V, GF)
$9
Nachos of Ulysses with Music Hall’s vegan chili
SANDWICHES & WRAPS: VEGETABLE MATTERS
*Any of our sandwiches can also be served over rice or lettuce instead of bread (GF)*
Serape (V+)
$7
low-fat vegan refried beans wrapped in a whole wheat tortilla with Music Hall vegan chili, brown rice & salsa.
Serape Grande (V)
$8
the Serape with monterey jack and sour cream
Kaffiyeh (V+)
$7
Music Hall’s freshly made hummus, shredded carrots, diced tomatoes & alfalfa sprouts wrapped in a flat pita
Pareo (V)
$8
whole wheat tortilla spread with our homemade herbed cream cheese wrapped around ripe avocado, shredded carrots, juicy tomatoes, diced red onions & alfalfa sprouts cut into bite sized pieces *try it with one of our fresh deli meats $10* *add chicken breast $3*
Pan Bagna (V)
$8
vegetarian sandwich with provolone, tomatoes, red onions & romaine served on a baguette with a savory garlic-basil balsamic vinaigrette *try it with one of our fresh deli meats $10*
The Music Hall Veggie Burger (V)
$9
delicious vegetarian burger on a whole wheat kaiser roll with melted monterey jack, romaine, tomatoes, grilled onions, ketchup & mustard
Chili Veggie Burger (V)
$10
add Music Hall’s homemade vegan chili to your veggie burger
Great Balls of Liar…The Music Hall Vegetalian Meatball Sub (V)
$10
toasted baguette stuffed with chopped veggie burger, grilled onions, garlic-basil balsamic vinaigrette, tomato sauce & melted mozzarella
MEATIER ISSUES
Wrap of Grace
$9
smoked turkey breast, alfalfa sprouts, diced tomatoes & red onions drizzled with a garlic-basil balsamic vinaigrette & wrapped in a flat pita
Sam & Joe’s Deli Wrap
$9
sliced roast beef, provolone, romaine, diced onions & tomatoes with a tangy horseradish sauce, wrapped in a flat pita
Freddy’s Ham & Cheese
$9
sliced ham, provolone, romaine & tomatoes with dijon mustard on a whole wheat kaiser roll *served hot or cold*
Music Hall Club
$10
sliced ham, turkey & roast beef, provolone, romaine, tomatoes & a zesty pesto mayonnaise on a baguette
Herb Wrap
$9
your choice of smoked turkey, roast beef or ham with alfalfa sprouts, diced tomatoes & red onions on a flat pita with Music Hall’s own herbed cream cheese *add chicken breast $3*
Hot Wrap
$9
monterey jack & provolone melted over your choice of turkey, roast beef or ham with tomatoes & grilled onions, wrapped in a pita with Music Hall’s own pesto mayonnaise *add chicken breast $3*
Music Hall Chicken Breast Melt
$10
grilled chicken breast smothered in provolone with romaine, tomatoes, grilled onions & dijon mustard on a whole wheat kaiser roll
The Meat & Greet
$10
Music Hall’s own “steak & cheese”! diced roast beef, grilled onions, green peppers & melted monterey jack on a toasted baguette with tomatoes & romaine *ketchup & mayonnaise available on request*
Tastes Like Chicken
$10
Music Hall’s own “chicken steak & cheese”! diced grilled chicken breast grilled onions, green peppers & melted monterey jack on a toasted baguette with tomatoes & romaine *ketchup & mayonnaise available on request*
Chicken Karmasan
$10
diced grilled chicken breast topped with grilled onions, garlic-basil balsamic vinaigrette, tomato sauce & melted mozzarella on a toasted baguette
Kirk Sommer’s My Hero
$10
Grilled chicken breast with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, crushed slow roasted garlic, basil leaf shreds, sea salt & cracked black pepper on a warm scooped and pressed hero roll drizzled with balsamic vinegar.
PANINI - The Sandwich of Sophisticates
(takes about 10 – 15 minutes to grill)
Caprinini (V)
$10
focaccia bread brushed with olive oil & garlic-basil balsamic,vinaigrette, filled with fresh basil, tomatoes & fresh mozzarella
Veganini (V+)
$8
focaccia bread brushed with olive oil & olive tapenade, stuffed with spinach, roasted red peppers & grilled onions *add fresh mozzarella $3*
Dijonini
$10
focaccia bread with dijon mustard, grilled maple sugar ham & gooey swiss cheese
Cordonini
$10
same great sandwich as the dijonini, but with a grilled chicken breast to boot!
Pizzanini
$10
grilled pepperoni & onions stuffed into focaccia bread with tomato sauce & your choice of mozzarella or provolone
Weinernini
$7
now that’s a hot dog! a grilled 1/4 pound all beef hot dog with grilled onions, sauerkraut, ketchup & mustard all in a grilled potato hot dog bun *vegan dog available on request*
EXTRAS
grilled chicken breast
$3
ham, turkey, or roast beef
$3
Music Hall vegan chili or salsa (V+)
$2
refried beans (V+ & low fat)
$2
monterey jack or provolone
$2
fresh mozzarella
$3
corn tortilla chips
$2
avocado
$2
heart of palm
$2
sour cream
$2
SWEETS
Ask about today’s selection of freshly baked cookies & brownies $4
Music Hall Cupcakes
$5
Made by Buzz Bakery in Alexandria, VA, our Music Hall Cupcakes are the best thing you can possibly put in your mouth. Supplies are limited each night, so come early to get one!
Music Hall BEER SELECTION
Our selection of beers is subject to change due to availability.
